channel.title: Reputation
channel.description: Was thinking if we could get a rep reset for these forums, since mpscp and mitb both have separate rep, why not this forum too?

item.title: Reputation
item.dc:creator: @LilXCj LilXCj
item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

[quote=“badger41, post:21, topic:391127”][quote author=LilXCj link=topic=487076.msg3572763#msg3572763 date=1303176157]

awe’ i wanted to see the mods and staff with 10 rep

(btw lil offtopic but since your here, why are there staff members that are totaly inactive?
like those admins with 500 posts)

Because they are some of the original runescape cheat creators and they have been around since runescape classic.

In other words, they now have a wife and kids they can get laid unlike 90% of our forums.

getting laid would not necessarily push you away from mopar, so what are you getting at?

Exactly, when I move into an apartment in the next few years with my girlfriend. I’m going to infect my girlfriend with minecraft.
[/quote]

getting laid and moving into a building with your girlfriend are 2 separate things.[/quote]

I secretly implied I get laid in between infection and moving in.

Read full topic

item.title: Reputation
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

No I didn’t.

SMF comes by default with a positive rep and negative rep field. Normally they are added together to get your total reputation. When I added MoparScape.org, I made the pos_rep field moparisthebest.com rep, and the neg_rep field is moparisthebest.com rep.

If I were to make another website have seperate reputation, I would have to either:

  1. Come up with a different system.
  2. Add another field to every user in the database, then change karma.php extensively, then change every file that views/modifies reputation extensively.

So, in short, I think it is fine the way it is and I don’t want to do it.

Read full topic

Moparisthebest:

The rep here is the same as the MoparScape rep, and unless I do major changes on the forums it has to stay that way, sorry.

But you made a whole new one for MITB, I don’t see why moparcraft is an exception.
